content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 25 Mar 2019How to avoid penalty fee for bank acct minimum sum?If i remove all the cash from a particular bank account, so that the balance is literally set to "0" value.  Theoretically speaking, there's no cash left for the bank to deduct its penalties? If down the road, i decide to put in more cash, there is no accrued penalties to be incurred once more?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Apr 2019Put in enough cash not to accrue said penalty each time.0 comments0
